overview: Valerie has a job to do, but Todd is playing games. And there is something lurking in the night that doesn’t like to lose. With a surreal take on the analog, neon backdrop of the1980’s, Shiny Diamonds follows a religious acolyte on her first night out proselytizing. Valerie has her work cut out for her, seeking to change the status quo amid a culture of toxic masculinity in a work environment that’s anything but familiar.
title: Shiny Diamonds
